projects.title: Universal Data Schemas
projects.author: Dr. Sarah Chen
projects.description: A comprehensive library of universal data schemas for cross-platform interoperability. Includes schemas for scientific data, financial transactions, and IoT devices.

featuredProjects.title: Atlas: Universal Mathematical Language
featuredProjects.author: UOR Foundation
featuredProjects.description: A breakthrough showing how five exceptional Lie groups derive from a single 96-vertex construct. The Golden Seed Vector reveals the universal mathematical language for generating complexity with mathematical certainty.

featuredProjects.title: Atomic Language Model
featuredProjects.author: UOR Foundation
featuredProjects.description: A mathematically rigorous language model implementing Chomsky's Minimalist Grammar. Uses Coq-verified proofs and probabilistic rule weighting for infinite syntax generation.

shareProject.title: Share Your Project
shareProject.description: Built something with UOR? We'd love to feature your project and help you connect with the community.
